author: HillaryKnox
post_text: November 2, 2015 at 7:17 PM#1Is there a command line/macro way to put all Group Masters at full (regardless of what executor they are assigned to?). Normally I'd address specific executors, but I have group masters that change location on a daily basis, as well as group masters that are created & deleted on a daily basis. So I'm basically looking for a command line version of holding down Group and pressing All Positive/Negative Full.
title: All Group Masters at Full?
